author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1726 - Improve support for local caching in DataStoreBlobStore
Adding CacheLIRS with default size of 16 MB. Any binary less than 17 KB can be cached

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1667 - Encode Blob length as part of blobId in DataStoreBlobStore
Fix the test logic as we encode the length by default.

author: stack
msg: HBASE-10997 Add a modulo argument to PE to constrain the key range
